author: Joel Khalili
title: Remote working could put an end to the office as we know it
description: The world’s largest remote working experiment is set to have an enduring impact on the way we work.
content: The ongoing pandemic has brought about the worlds largest remote working experiment, with tens of millions forced to participate worldwide and its outcome will likely have repercussions that will reverberate long after the last quarantine restrictions are lif… [+12729 chars]
